OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: The IP is used to delete line items from cart and add new line item in cart.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: ReplaceOfferInCart

omniProcessElements.name: DeleteCartItemsOrder
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "RootItemIds" : "%RootItemIdsToDelete%", "SalesOrderId" : "%cartId%", "include" : "validatePromotions" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "cartType==\"Order\"", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "disconnectOrderLineItems", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "response", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: DeleteCartItemsQuote
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "RootItemIds" : "%RootItemIdsToDelete%", "SalesQuoteId" : "%cartId%", "actionType" : "Delete", "include" : "validatePromotions" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "cartType==\"Quote\"", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "disconnectLineItems", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "response", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: postCartItemCall
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "cartId" : "%cartId%", "items" : [ { "itemId" : "%itemIdToAdd%" } ], "noResponseNeeded" : true, "price" : true, "validate" : true }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction2", "remoteClass" : "CpqAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "postCartsItems", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }
